displaytitle: The World's Edge, Remembering Magellan – The Atlantic Ocean, Cabo de Sao Vicente, Portugal
creditline: Museum purchase, bequest of John W. H. Simpson, Class of 1966, in memory of Wellington Hope Simpson, Class of 1931
inscribed:
In graphite on mount, below image lower right: Thomas
In ink, verso center: THE WORLD’S EDGE / REMEMBERING MAGELLAN — THE ATLANTIC OCEAN / FIVE CAPES — PORTUGAL / 1994 / CABO DE SÃO VICENTE / (6 A.M. THE NEXT DAY) / THE FURTHEST SOUTHWEST POINT OF CONTINENTAL EUROPE / [PART EIGHT OF AN EIGHT PART WORK] / — THE EDGE OF THE RENAISSANCE WORLD — / © Thomas Joshua Cooper A//P —unique split set— / negative 1994 // print 1994
